trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_SEQ_00<tab>The stylish stranger is eagerly looking about.

TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_SEQ_01<tab>As you walk along the avenue, you cannot help but notice a stylishly dressed man who perks up upon sighting you. Introducing himself as Metem, he explains that he represents Ascension Arcadia, the premier enterprise for entertainment in the city, which boasts the Arcadion as its flagship facility. He states that he has been seeking its next star─you─to join the Ascension Arcadia Championship. If you are interested in learning more, he bids you proceed to the Arcadion's doors, where an attendant will escort you to the greenroom.

TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_SEQ_02<tab>Though you are not yet sure what to think of Metem, you are nevertheless enticed by the idea of joining this championship. So it is that you make your way to the Arcadion and beckon the attendant awaiting your arrival to show you inside.
※In the event that you leave the area, you may return by speaking with the Arcadion attendant in front of the Arcadion.

TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_SEQ_03<tab>Metem informs you that each fighter in the Ascension Arcadia Championship employs the use of feral souls to augment their strength, and the three tiers of the competition are divided by the potency of the souls utilized: the light-heavyweight tier at the lowest level, followed by the cruiserweight tier, and finally the heavyweight tier at the highest level. Your goal is to climb the ranks by defeating the respective champions of each tier and ultimately become the grand champion. To ensure the matches are fair, Metem requires that the souls of seven fighters join you in battle. Should you be victorious in your matches, he promises to set them free.

TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_SEQ_04<tab>With the rules now thoroughly elucidated, and the objective of freeing the souls stored in the repository in mind, you decide to accept Metem's proposal. When you are ready to face your first opponent, you need only speak with him to begin.
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Arcadion attendant.
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the Arcadion attendant.
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Metem.
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_000_000<tab>Ah, I've found you at last!
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_000_001<tab>You, my good <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, were <var 1A 02 /var>born<var 1A 01 /var> to be a star!
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_000_002<tab>(-Metem-)Allow me to introduce myself. I am Metem, head of strategic management at Ascension Arcadia, the premier enterprise for entertainment in Solution Nine.

TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_000_003<tab>(-Metem-)Our flagship facility is the Arcadion, a combat arena, and it is there that we host the Ascension Arcadia Championship. It is the pinnacle for fighters in Alexandria─and I want you to be among them!
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_000_004<tab>(-Metem-)As you may have heard, circumstance had forced us to close the arena's doors for a time. But the time is right to reopen them.

TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_000_005<tab>(-Metem-)Her Majesty's tragic passing has left our citizens disconsolate. By providing them with gripping entertainment, it is our hope to help them to forget their cares for a while.

TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_000_006<tab>(-Metem-)If we are to accomplish that, however, it will not do to show them what they have seen countless times before. No, they need something new─<var 1A 02 /var>someone<var 1A 01 /var> new!

TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_000_007<tab>(-Metem-)And who better than <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> who not only protected our citizens from the king's army, but struck down the king himself! ...That <var 1A 02 /var>was<var 1A 01 /var> you, yes?
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_000_008<tab>(-Metem-)So it was, so it was! And so, for your strength and valor, the president of the federation has marked you to be the Arcadion's next great star!

TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_000_009<tab>(-Metem-)Just imagine it: an upstart─the people's protector─arrives on the scene, and challenges the Arcadion's mightiest to rise up as grand champion! What could be more gripping, I ask you!?
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_000_010<tab>(-Metem-)For your part, you will naturally be well compensated! The finest equipment Solution Nine has to offer awaits you after each and every victory!

TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_000_011<tab>(-Metem-)I daresay this has you enticed, but you needn't make up your mind right away. If you are keen to test your strength and win rich rewards, then come to the Arcadion at the end of this avenue. The attendant will show you in.
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_100_011<tab>(-Metem-)With that, I bid you farewell for now. I shall look forward to a favorable response!
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_ARCADIAATTENDANT_000_030<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Master Metem has been expecting you. If you would follow me, I will take you to him.
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_SYSTEM_100_030<tab>Enter the Arcadion?
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_000_100<tab>You came! By this, I take it you will fight in the Arcadion!
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_000_101<tab>Allow me to be the first to welcome you to the fold! Now then, I shall explain to you─
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_YAANA_000_102<tab>(-Haughty Lass-)Hmph... You look like you've got some fight in you, I suppose.
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_YAANA_000_103<tab>(-Haughty Lass-)Still, you can only be so strong without being a soulshifter. You wouldn't last long against any of us.
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_HONEYBLOVELY_000_104<tab>(-Darling Damsel-)Well, aren't you just a treat? I look forward to meeting you on stage!
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_BRUTEBOMBER_000_105<tab>(-Hulking Bruiser-)You're a puny candle before my roaring flame! Make it to me, and I'll blast you out of the ring!

TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_000_106<tab>Those are some of the fighters you will face. They are all...ahem, characters, as you can see, but I hope you do not take offense at their words. Consider it their way of welcoming you!

TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_100_106<tab>Now, where was I? Ah, yes. As I have mentioned, the Ascension Arcadia Championship is a fighting competition. The realm's mightiest duke it out in a bid to become the grand champion.
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_100_107<tab>I've no doubt that all Alexandrians would be captivated by your journey as a challenger, and cheer you on as you fight your way up the ranks!
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_000_107<tab>And speaking of ranks, the fighters of the Arcadion are divided into three tiers: light-heavyweight, cruiserweight, and heavyweight.
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_100_108<tab>The ultimate objective is to become the undisputed champion in all the tiers, and thereby rise up as the grand champion.
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_000_108<tab>As a rookie, your campaign begins in the light-heavyweight tier, where you must defeat your three rivals ranked therein.
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_000_109<tab>Goodness gracious me, I almost forgot to mention a most important thing!
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_000_110<tab>The Arcadion has its own repository of feral souls, which our fighters utilize in battle.

TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_000_111<tab>So potent are these souls, they alter the fighters' very forms. Lest you wonder, it is the potency of the souls employed that separates the championship's three tiers.
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_000_112<tab>Now, I'm given to understand you do not use a regulator. Even when you faced the king, you did not rely on souls of any kind. That is most impressive indeed!
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_000_113<tab>Be that as it may, it would be egregiously unfair for you to compete with naught to balance the scales.
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_000_114<tab>Fortunately, here at the Arcadion, we also have the souls of former champions in storage. We will use them to create allies to fight alongside you.
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_000_115<tab>And to make sure they work with you like a well-oiled machine, we will draw upon your memories to fine-tune their appearance and abilities to your liking!
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_A1_000_001<tab>That sounds a lot like the Endless.
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_A1_000_002<tab>Like the arcane manifestation of Gulool Ja Ja...

TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_000_116<tab>“Endless”? I'm not familiar with that term, but I assure you there is nothing untoward in the technique we employ. It simply brings forth a temporary simulacrum.

TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_000180_METEM_000_117<tab>My, such marvelous magicks exist in your world? Intriguing! Electrope is the medium employed here, but I daresay it is similar in bringing forth a temporary simulacrum.
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_000_118<tab>And for the purposes of evening the odds, I believe seven of these simulacra should suffice. What do you think?
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_A2_000_001<tab>Using souls for entertainment is wrong.
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_A2_000_002<tab>The souls in your repository should be set free.
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_000_122<tab>Hm-hm... I had expected that you might harbor reservations about the use of souls. Those who hail from outside the barrier often do.
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_000_123<tab>And so I have a proposal─an additional incentive, if you will. For each victory you claim, I shall release the souls of those who fought beside you.
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_100_124<tab>You, my friend, would be the star who brings fresh change to the Arcadion!
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_100_125<tab>So, what say you? Are you willing to fight under those terms?

TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_100_126<tab>Excellent! Now, I would tell you more about the Arcadion...but let us save it for after your first bout. After all, it'd be pointless if you end up losing straightaway.
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_METEM_000_130<tab>With that, I officially welcome you as a fighter of the Arcadion! When you are ready to take to the arena, you need but say the word!
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_SYSTEM_000_140<tab>By completing matches in the Ascension Arcadia Championship, you may earn valuable artifacts.
TEXT_KINGRA101_04960_SYSTEM_000_141<tab>These can be exchanged for equipment by speaking with Hhihwi in Solution Nine.
